name: Get me out of here (yaeldemers)
description:
The jam theme was deserted, this is a prototype where you play as a rat trying to escape a house full of cats, traps.

Being mostly beginners who didn't know the engine, this is somewhat of a win in it of itself. We had two variant of cat enemies (patrol and chase) that led to us adding stealth mechanics like hiding.

Due to last minute bugs, we had to put some of these ideas and most of our initial levels aside and put together a "working" demo.
